overview: After Adam wrecks his crime-boss stepfather's car, he takes a job as a driver for a business associate. He soon finds out that this business associate is Roy - an aging hitman on the eve of his retirement. Thrust into a world of murder and revenge, a series of unexpected events lands the pair in a game of cat and mouse with a mysterious Latvian woman.
title: The Hitman's Apprentice (aka The Liability)
